Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hello,

I use Heritrix 3.1.1, and I need to download a lot of pages and their
elements (stylesheets, images) but I don't want to follow the links. (The
page URLs will be in one job.)

How can I set this up in the configuration?

Thanks in advance,
Zsolt

--e89a8ff1c03e22957b04e84f80d6
